fields.name: is_the_child_pain_free_on_admission
fields.label: **Is the child pain free on admission?** (If No, implement and Age Appropriate Pain Assessment Tool)![alt text](assets/images/pain_assessment.jpg "Pain Assessment Tool")

fields.name: intervention_provided
fields.label: **Intervention Provided**
fields.placeholder: state what, e.g. medication hot / cold pack

fields.name: pain_experienced_and_dealt_with_prior_to_admission
fields.label: **Pain experienced and dealt with prior to Admission**

fields.name: how_was_this_pain_dealt_with
fields.label: **How was this pain dealt with?** Has it improved / changed / got worse or better?

fields.name: patient_skin
fields.label: *Take a picture of the Patient Diagram*

cards.name: glamorgan_pressure_assessment_scale
cards.label: Adapted Glamorgan Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment Scale

fields.name: this_tool
fields.label: **N.B.** *This tool should be used to support not replace your clinical judgement as to whether the child is at risk of pressure ulcer development*.

cards.name: glamorgan_scale_risk_factor
cards.label: Glamorgan Scale - Risk Factor
cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new assessment.

fields.name: date_of_assessment
fields.label: **Date of Assessment** (reassess at least daily and every time condition changes)

fields.name: risk_factor
fields.label: **Risk Factor** (*if data such as serum albumin or haemoglobin is not available, write NK - not known and score 0*)

options.20_child_cannot_be_moved: Child cannot be moved without great difficulty or deterioration in condition / under General Anaesthetic >2 Hours (Score 20).
options.15_unable_to_change: Unable to change his / her position without assistance / cannot control body movement (Score 15).
options.10_some_mobility: Some mobility, but reduced for age (Score 10).

fields.name: risk_factor_rubbing
fields.label: **Equipment / Objects / Hard Surface**, pressing or rubbing on skin - (Score 15)

fields.name: 1_persistent_pyrexia
fields.label: **Persistent Pyrexia** (temperature > 38.0 degreesC for more than 4 hours) - (Score 1)

fields.name: 1_poor_peripheral_perfusion
fields.label: **Poor peripheral perfusion** (cold extremities / capillary refill > 2 seconds / cool mottled skin) - (Score 1)

fields.name: 2_inadequate_nutrition
fields.label: **Inadequate Nutrition** / PYMS score >2 (discuss with dietician if in doubt) - (Score 2)

options.0_not_at_risk: 0 = Not at Risk - Continue to reassess daily and every time condition changes.
options.10_at_risk: 10+ = At Risk - Inspect skin at least twice a day. Relieve pressure by helping / encouraging the child to move at least every 2 hours. Use a size and weight appropriate pressure redistribution surface for sitting on & / or sleeping on if necessary.
options.15_high_risk: 15+ = High Risk - Inspect skin with each repostioning. Repostition child / equipment / devices at least every 2 hours. Relieve pressure before any skin discolouration develops. Use a size and weight appropriate pressure redistribution surface for sitting on & / or sleeping on.
options.20_very_high_risk: 20+ = Very High Risk - Inspect skin at least hourly if condition allows. Move or turn if possible, before skin becomes discoloured (refer to EUPAP grade 1). Ensure equipment / objects are not pressing on the skin. Consider using specialised pressure relieving equipment. Refer to local guidlelines / protocol if available, if not contact / refer to TVN.

fields.name: action_taken
fields.label: **Action Taken** (*Yes or No - Ensure plan of care is implemented / reviewed for all identified areas of concern*).

cards.name: glamorgan_scale_ulcer_record
cards.label: Glamorgan Scale - Ulcer Record
cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new assessment.

fields.name: indicate_on_diagram
fields.label: **Using numbers**, indicate on the diagram above any discoloured areas or pressure ulcers, then using the boxes below, describe the lesion, the date it was first observed and the outcome (resolved or not resolved) on resolution, completion of this form, transfer or discharge (whichever comes first).

fields.name: ulcer_record
fields.label: *Take a picture of the Paediatric Pressure Ulcer Record diagram*

cards.name: recent_medication
cards.label: Recent Medication
cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new medication.

fields.name: medication_prescribed_over_counter
fields.label: **Medication prescribed over counter**
fields.placeholder: medication taken in relation to this presenting condition, including homeopathic remedies.

cards.name: regular_medication
cards.label: Regular Medication
cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new medication.

fields.name: medication
fields.label: **Medication**
fields.placeholder: medication usually prescribed on a long term basis.

cards.name: parents_medication

cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new medication.

fields.name: medication
fields.label: **Medication**
fields.placeholder: record any medication brought into hospital.

fields.name: is_child_aged2years_or_more
fields.label: **Is child aged 2 years or more** (if yes complete S.T.A.M.P Nutrition Screening Assessment form)

cards.name: stamp
cards.label: STAMP Screening Form
cards.instructions: Click the '+' below for each new assessment.

fields.name: 1_diagnosis
fields.label: **Step 1 - Diagnosis** - does the child have a diagnosis that has any nutritional implications?

fields.name: 2_nutritional_intake
fields.label: **Step 2 - Nutritional Intake** - what's the child's nutritional intake?

options.recently_decreased_or_poor_nutritional_i: Recently Decreased or Poor Nutritional Intake (Score 2).
options.no_change_in_eating_patterns_and_good_nu: No Change in Eating Patterns and Good Nutritional Intake (Score 0).

fields.name: 3_weight_and_height
fields.label: **Step 3 - Weight and Height** - use a growth chart or the Centile Quick Reference Tables to determine the child's measurements.

options.centile_spaces_columns_apart_or_weight: Greater than 3 Centile Spaces / â¥ 3 Columns Apart (or Weight <2nd centile) (Score 3).
options.centile_spaces_2_columns_apart: Greater than 2 Centile Spaces / = 2 Columns Apart(Score 1).

fields.name: 4_overall_risk_of_malnutrition
fields.label: **Step 4 - Overall Risk of Malnutrition** - Add up the Scores from the Boxes in Steps 1 - 3 to Calculate the Overall Risk of Malnutrition

fields.name: 5_care_plan
fields.label: **Step 5 - Care Plan** - What is the child's overall risk of malnutrition, as calculated in step 4?

options.high_risk: High Risk - Take Action; Refer the Child to a Dietitian, Nutritional Support Team, or Consultant; Monitor as per Care Plan.
options.medium_risk: Medium Risk - Monitor the Child's Nutritional Intake for 3 Days; Repeat the STAMP Screening After 3 Days; Amend Care Plan as Required.
options.low_risk: Low Risk - Continue Routine Clinical Care; Repeat the STAMP Screening Weekly while the Child is an in-Patient; Amend Care Plan as Required.

fields.name: safer_sleeping_guidance_received
fields.label: **Safer Sleeping Guidance Received?** - [Link to Safer Sleeping Guidance Policy](http://howis.wales.nhs.uk/sitesplus/documents/861/Infant%20Safer%20Sleeping%20Guidance%20FINAL%204%206%2014.pdf)

fields.name: any_problems
fields.label: **Any problems or concerns with child's feet?**

fields.name: risk_identified
fields.label: **Is this Child at risk of Falling?** - All children are at risk of falling. However risk may be increased due to the onset of illness or injury. On assessment of the child's ability to mobilise (see section mobility below) have any significant risks in relation to increased risks of falling occurring been identified.

fields.name: what_risks
fields.label: **If YES**, please state what these risks are?
fields.placeholder: e.g. cerebral palsy, on crutches etc.

fields.name: and_what_action
fields.label: **And what action is required to minimise these risks?**
fields.placeholder: e.g. bedrails / cot sides in use / accompanied when using crutches etc.

fields.name: whilst_attending_to_this_patient
fields.label: **Whilst attending to this patient is there a risk of injury?** (If YES, please complete a full BCUHB Manual Handling Risk Assessment Form detailing risks and methods to be used in caring for this patient, according to the Manual Handling Risk Assessment.)

fields.name: concernson_admission
fields.label: **Concerns on Admission** (**NB. Any child in need/child protection concerns identified now or later should be dealt with according to policy and events, action taken and contacts fully recorded within this multidisciplinary document**) - [Link to Safeguarding Liaison Form](http://howis.wales.nhs.uk/sitesplus/documents/861/safeguarding_liaison_form_0911.doc)

fields.name: social_services_contacted
fields.label: **Social Services contacted** - [Link to BCUHB Safeguarding referral to Social Services](http://howis.wales.nhs.uk/sitesplus/861/document/321421)

fields.name: problem_identified
fields.label: **_Problem Identified_** (**if yes** please complete appropriate documentation and make relevant referrals)

fields.label: Have Parents / carers watched the 'I Promise' DVD
